about_the_game:
Immerse yourself into the atmosphere of the mysterious rural town with this collection of goodies. Show your support for the developers of Saint Kotar.

As a supporter you get:

  • Official prologue wallpapers in 4k resolution (5 backgrounds)
  • Official prologue concept arts in 4k resolution (10 backgrounds)
  • Official prologue soundtrack (7 tracks)
  • The "print your own" Yellow Mask
  • Printable t-shirt template (exclusive "Saint Kotar Effigy" design)
detailed_description:
Immerse yourself into the atmosphere of the mysterious rural town with this collection of goodies. Show your support for the developers of Saint Kotar.

As a supporter you get:

  • Official prologue wallpapers in 4k resolution (5 backgrounds)
  • Official prologue concept arts in 4k resolution (10 backgrounds)
  • Official prologue soundtrack (7 tracks)
  • The "print your own" Yellow Mask
  • Printable t-shirt template (exclusive "Saint Kotar Effigy" design)
legal_notice: © 2020 The-Mark Entertainment d.o.o. Saint Kotar, the Saint Kotar logo and The-Mark Entertainment logo are registered trademarks or trademarks of The-Mark Entertainment d.o.o. All rights reserved.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: any
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A PDF reader for the digital content and a printer to print the Yellow Mask.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: any
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A PDF reader for the digital content and a printer to print the Yellow Mask.

name: Saint Kotar: Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: any
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A PDF reader for the digital content and a printer to print the Yellow Mask.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Immerse yourself into the atmosphere of the mysterious rural town with this collection of goodies. Show your support for the developers of Saint Kotar.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Russian, Polish, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Czech, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
